attributes.action: United Kingdom to adopt the same immigration policy as the President of the USA.
attributes.additional_details:
We have all seen the illegal immigrants on the Border Control TV programmes. Some get caught, but if they don't have a passport they are free again. The Govt doesn't know their background.
Stop the immigration from terrorist related countries now.
Target the base of the fire before it is started.
President Trump is protecting his Country and the British Prime Minister should do the same.
attributes.background:
The British Border Control system is a shambles. We are a potential target for acts of terrorism from many Countries whose groups claim to do it as part of their faith.
Target the base of the fire and stop Muslim Countries who have had participation in terrorist acts coming to the UK. 
Protect us!
